thread.title: Heavy Rain Brings Flash Floods But It Has Also Created An Opportunity For World Patent Marketing and Eaves Dropper

author: cbs8
title: Heavy Rain Brings Flash Floods But It Has Also Created An Opportunity For World Patent Marketing and Eaves Dropper
text:
The New York Inventor Exchange approves the Eaves Dropper for licensing and trading intellectual property rights.
Miami, FL (PRWEB) October 10, 2015
World Patent Marketing, a vertically integrated manufacturer and engineer of patented products, announces the Eaves dropper, a landscaping invention that provides an economical and practical solution for watering potted and hanging plants.
"The landscaping industry has had a tough five years." said Scott J. Cooper, CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing . "However, I am forecasting over the next five years there will be a rapid construction sector recovery which will boost reinvestment in outsourced yard care. The timing is perfect."
“Plants of all types and sizes can now be found in almost every home these days,” says Cattya Bella, Director of Product Development for World Patent Marketing Review. “Although they add aesthetics and neutral tones to any space, it would take a whole lot of effort to take care of. The Eaves dropper is a landscaping invention which allows people to take good care of their plants and lengthen their life span without too much effort.”
The Eaves dropper is a landscaping invention that provides a better and more efficient solution in providing ample hydration to potted and hanging plants. Plants need a lot of care and are more prone to wilting when it is not properly hydrated. The unique design of this invention creates a way to collect rainwater from the roof and direct it to reach the plants that need to be watered. In addition to providing water, it can store said rainwater in a container for later use. This allows all those potted and hanging plants to get their daily dose of water even when not physically present at home, thus enabling it to have a longer life span.
“The Eaves dropper will significantly improve how people take care of their plants at home,” says inventor Michelle L. “This landscaping invention allows to make use of rainwater to keep these plants hydrated even when under a covered area. In addition to this, it helps plant owners to conserve on water and lessen their utility bills.”
Fran Hudson, a gardening enthusiast from Portland, OR, has this to say about the Eaves dropper: “One of the most frustrating things about having plants in a home is that they tend to wilt when the whole family goes on extended vacation trips. With this amazing invention known as the Eaves dropper, I can now water my plants and economically store rainwater even without me being at home.”
The Eaves dropper is a landscaping invention that significantly improves how people take care of their plants and keep it hydrated at all times.
ABOUT WORLD PATENT MARKETING
World Patent Marketing is an innovation incubator and manufacturer of patented products for inventors and entrepreneurs. The company is broken into eight operating divisions: Research, Patents, Prototyping, Manufacturing, Retail, Web & Apps, Social Media and Capital Ventures.
World Patent Marketing is by your side every step of the way, utilizing our capital and experience to protect, prepare, and manufacture your new product idea and get it out to the market. The company sends representatives to to trade shows every month in order to further advocate for its clients. It is just part of the World Patent Marketing cost of doing business.
WORLD PATENT MARKETING REVIEWS
World Patent Marketing complaints from clients are extremely rare which is demonstrated by its A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau and its five star ratings from consumer review sites including: Consumer Affairs, Google, Trustpilot, Customer Lobby, Reseller Ratings, Yelp and My3Cents.
Desa Industries, Inc . doing business as World Patent Marketing is also a proud member of the National Association of Manufacturers, Duns and Bradstreet, the US Chamber of Commerce, the South Florida Chamber of Commerce, the Greater Miami Chamber of Commerce, Association for Manufacturing Excellence, and the New York Inventor Exchange. Visit the worldpatentmarketing.com website. Contact us at (888) 926-8174 (US Eastern Time) or email bill@worldpatentmarketing.com.
